name: Journey After Laughter
description:
Journey After Laughter is a Game based on a fictional story where there is a planet callled "XD" and these peaple are Called LOL but unfortunately A deadly disease called Laughter killed all the lols ALL Exept for one 

Controls

W forward 

S backwards

A Left

D Right

QandE for rotation 

Shift for Sprint 

Game itself 

Find food to eat and don't let "LOL" die of starvation i added some samples right next to start position as Demo

Go to bed before "lol" die because of not getting enough sleep 

the bed is in House near start position
